original_text: I call God as my witness—and I stake my life on it—that it was in order to spare you that I did not return to Corinth.
korean_text: 내가 내 목숨을 걸고 하나님을 불러 증언하시게 하노니 내가 다시 고린도에 가지 아니한 것은 너희를 아끼려 함이라

sentences.original_text: I call God as my witness
and I stake my life on it
that it was in order to spare you
that I did not return to Corinth
